Verses: 1 oruvanum Thodaraadhirundhum Dhunmaarkkar Odippogiraargal; Needhimaangalo Singaththaippole Dhairiyamaayirukkiraargal.
2 dhesaththin Paavaththinimiththam Adhin Adhigaarigal Anegaraayirukkiraargal; Buththiyum Arivumulla Manushanaalo Adhin Narseer Neediththirukkum.
3 ezhaigalai Odukkugira Dhariththiran Aagaaram Vilaiyaadhapadi Vellamaai Adiththukkondupogira Mazhaiyaippolirukkiraan.
4 vedhappramaanaththai Vittu Vilagugiravargal Dhunmaarkkaraip Pugazhugiraargal; Vedhappramaanaththaik Kaikkollugiravargalo Avargalode Poraadugiraargal.
5 dhushtar Nyaayaththai Ariyaargal; Karththaraith Thedugiravargalo Sagalaththaiyum Arivaargal.
6 iruvazhigalil Nadakkira Thiriyaavarakkaaran Aisuvariyavaanaayirundhaalum, Nermaiyaai Nadakkira Thariththiran Avanilum Vaasi.
7 vedhappramaanaththaik Kaikkollugiravan Vivegamulla Puththiran; Pojanappiriyarukkuth Thozhanaayirukkiravano Than Thagappanai Avamaanappaduththugiraan.
8 aniyaaya Vattiyinaalum Aadhaayaththinaalum Than Aasthiyaip Perugappannugiravan, Dhariththirarperil Irangugiravanukkaaga Adhai Segarikkiraan.
9 vedhaththaik Kelaadhapadi Thanseviyai Vilakkugiravanudaiya Jebamum Aruvaruppaanadhu.
10 uththamargalai Mosappaduththi, Pollaadha Vazhiyile Nadaththugiravan Thaan Vettina Kuzhiyil Thaane Vizhuvaan; Uththamargalo Nanmaiyai Sudhandharippaargal.
11 aisuvariyavaan Than Paarvaikku Gnaanavaan; Buththiyulla Dhariththirano Avanaip Parisodhikkiraan.
12 needhimaangal Kalikoorumbodhu Magaa Kondaattam Undaagum; Dhunmaarkkar Ezhumbumbodho Manushar Maraindhukollugiraargal.
13 than Paavangalai Maraikkiravan Vaazhvadaiyamaattaan; Avaigalai Arikkai Seydhu Vittuvidugiravano Irakkam Peruvaan.
14 eppozhudhum Bayandhirukkiravan Baakkiyavaan; Than Irudhayaththaik Kadinappaduththugiravano Theengil Vizhuvaan.
15 ezhai Janangalai Aalum Dhushta Adhigaari Gerchchikkum Singaththukkum Alaindhuthirigira Karadikkum Oppaayirukkiraan.
16 prabu Buththiyeenanaayirundhaal Avan Seyyum Idukkan Migudhi; Porulaasaiyai Verukkiravan Theerkkaayusaip Peruvaan.
17 raththappazhikkaaga Odukkappattavan Kuzhiyil Olikka Odivandhaal, Avanai Aadharikkavendaam.
18 uththamanaai Nadakkiravan Ratchikkappaduvaan; Maarupaadaana Iruvazhiyil Nadakkiravano Avatril Ondrile Vizhuvaan.
19 than Nilaththaip Payiridugiravan Aagaaraththaal Thrupthiyaavaan; Veenaraip Pinpatrugiravano Varumaiyaal Niraindhiruppaan.
20 unmaiyulla Manushan Paripoorana Aaseervaadhangalaip Peruvaan; Aisuvariyavaanaagiradharkuth Theevirikkiravano Aakkinaikkuth Thappaan.
21 mugadhaatchiniyam Nalladhalla, Mugadhaatchiniyamullavan Oru Thundu Appaththukkaaga Aniyaayanseyvaan.
22 vankannan Selvanaagiradharkup Padharugiraan, Varumai Thanakku Varumendru Ariyaadhirukkiraan.
23 than Naavinaal Mugasthudhi Pesugiravanaippaarkkilum, Kadindhukollugiravan Mudivil Angeegaaram Peruvaan.
24 than Thagappanaiyum Than Thaayaiyum Kollaiyittu, Adhu Dhrogamalla Enbavan Paazhkkadikkira Manushanukkuth Thozhan.
25 perunenjan Vazhakkaik Koluvugiraan; Karththarai Nambugiravano Sezhippaan.
26 than Irudhayaththai Nambugiravan Moodan; Gnaanamaai Nadakkiravano Ratchikkappaduvaan.
27 thariththirarukkuk Koduppavan Thaazhchchiyadaiyaan; Than Kangalai Ezhaigalukku Vilakkugiravanukko Anega Saabangal Varum.
28 dhunmaarkkar Ezhumbumbodhu Manushar Maraindhukollugiraargal; Avargal Azhiyumbodho Needhimaangal Perugugiraargal.
